console.form.mysql.MysqlSource.object_tr: Enables you to select the database schema items to be migrated during activation or deactivation of the transfer.
console.form.mysql.MysqlSource.title: Endpoint parameters
console.form.mysql.MysqlSourceAdvancedSe: The database from which the data is migrated. Auxiliary tables will be created in it (__tm_keeper, __tm_gtid_keeper).
Time zone for connecting to the database
Used when connecting to a database. Accepts values from the IANA time zone database. By default: local server time zone.
console.form.mysql.MysqlTableFilter.excl: List of tables whose data will not be transferred. Set using regular expressions. Leave blank to transfer data from all tables.
console.form.mysql.MysqlTableFilter.incl: List of tables whose data will be transferred. Set using regular expressions. Leave blank to transfer data from all tables.
console.form.mysql.MysqlTarget.cleanup_p: Cleanup policy for activation, reactivation, and restart of the transfer.
console.form.mysql.MysqlTarget.title: Endpoint parameters
console.form.mysql.MysqlTargetAdvancedSe: Name of the database schema for auxiliary tables. Database name is used by default.
Disable constraint checks for FOREIGN_KEY and UNIQUE. Used to accelerate replication. Avoid it if the scheme uses cascade operations.
SQL modes on the MySQL server that correspond to the sql_mode variable.
Time zone for connecting to the database
Used when connecting to a database. Accepts values from IANA timezone database. By default: local server time zone.
console.form.mysql.OnPremiseMysql.ca_cer: PEM certificate of the X.509 certificate center used to authenticate connections to MySQL servers. If specified, TLS is used when connecting.
